cmake_minimum_required ( VERSION 2.8.5 )
project ( mongoose )

if ( MOAI_MONGOOSE )

  set ( CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR "${MOAI_ROOT}/3rdparty/mongoose/" )

  set ( CMAKE_C_FLAGS "${CMAKE_C_FLAGS} -DMOAI_WITH_MONGOOSE=1" PARENT_SCOPE)
  set ( CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS "${CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS} -DMOAI_WITH_MONGOOSE=1" PARENT_SCOPE)

  if ( BUILD_WINDOWS )
 	set ( CMAKE_C_FLAGS "${CMAKE_C_FLAGS} -DHAVE_STDINT=1" PARENT_SCOPE)
  endif ( BUILD_WINDOWS )

  set ( MONGOOSE_INCLUDES "${MOAI_ROOT}/3rdparty/mongoose/" PARENT_SCOPE )

  set ( MONGOOSE_SOURCES 

    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/mongoose.c
    
  PARENT_SCOPE )

else ( MOAI_MONGOOSE )

  set ( CMAKE_C_FLAGS "${CMAKE_C_FLAGS} -DMOAI_WITH_MONGOOSE=0" PARENT_SCOPE)
  set ( CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS "${CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS} -DMOAI_WITH_MONGOOSE=0" PARENT_SCOPE)

endif ( MOAI_MONGOOSE )
